summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Social Media Content Creator 4-step workflow. Backend APIs working perfectly. Frontend UI fully functional with minor clipboard/navigation issues in testing environment.

ui_bugs.issue: Copy to clipboard shows permission denied error in browser testing environment
Back button blocked by webpack dev server overlay iframe

design_issues.issue: Red error overlay visible showing runtime clipboard permission errors

passed_tests: Backend API endpoints (visual-styles, hooks, scripts) - all working
Visual style selection table loads with images
Visual style checkbox selection and Next button activation
Hook selection tabs (Ex TikTok, Professor, Official TikTok, Experienced, Learnings)
Hook tab filtering and hook selection functionality
Scripts selection with tab switching (Other Scripts, Engagement Triggers)
Script selection progress indicator (5/5 scripts selected)
Summary page displays all selected visual style, hook, and scripts
Forward navigation through all 4 steps of workflow
Copy button functionality (attempts to copy despite permission issues)
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix clipboard permissions error handling and webpack dev overlay blocking back navigation. Consider graceful fallback for clipboard functionality.
